meanings.sent1: She felt undrunk after choosing a soda instead of a beer.
meanings.sent2: He was undrunk at the party, opting for water instead of wine.
meanings.sent3: The undrunk punch bowl was a hit with the designated drivers.
meanings.sent4: Her undrunk state allowed her to drive everyone home safely.
meanings.sent5: The undrunk guests enjoyed the evening without any regrets.

meanings.sent1: The undrunk glass of milk sat on the table untouched.
meanings.sent2: She left her undrunk coffee on the counter as she rushed out the door.
meanings.sent3: The undrunk bottle of water was a reminder of his interrupted meal.
meanings.sent4: His undrunk smoothie waited patiently for his return.
meanings.sent5: The undrunk tea had gone cold by the time she remembered it.

meanings.sent1: The undrunk man was the designated driver for the night.
meanings.sent2: She remained undrunk throughout the party, sipping on juice.
meanings.sent3: The undrunk friend was the hero of the night, ensuring everyone got home safely.
meanings.sent4: His undrunk state allowed him to handle the situation calmly.
meanings.sent5: The undrunk teenager made responsible choices at the party.
